DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the safety and effectiveness of two different formulations of an HIV vaccine in infants born to HIV-infected women.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Effectiveness of Two Different Formulations of an HIV Vaccine in Infants Born to HIV-Infected Women
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Infants may be eligible for this study if they: Are 1 to 3 days old.
